info.name: Fallout Pipboy Amber
info.description:
Is your internet just too darn colourful?
Sick the net doesn't look like a post apocalyptic OS?
Turn the interwebz totally nukacola with MrB's Pipboy Amber Userstyle!
No cap refunds. May contain Mirelurks. Terminal implosions negligible.
info.additionalInfo:
Turn the interwebz totally nukacola!
A labour of fallout love.
Fun for an evenings play to see if it be possible-isa.
Hella buggy but that's half the funz of fallout eh? :D

Made for:
google, gmail, gcal 
facebook, twitter, youtube, fallout wikia.

Notes:
Started off with css all dead pretty and organised, 
but the more I added sites that aren't coded semantically (hai fb and google!) it all rather went to pot.
Most logo's don't show (but then y'know, you're on the domain tis pretty obvs.)
Background images have been switched off as styling them is almost impossible without JS.
This is mildly updated, so just like fallout 4 EXPECT BUGS. Totes authentic experience. lulz.

email if there's a site you want added:
hello[at]mrtb.studio
